price: 36. To bango nde bakela likolo na nsé? Kasi bazali kondima te?
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
